Note about "The Raid Redemption 2011": 
There are some weird versions floating around, WIKI version for instance has 19 sec cut (CHI rated), 
so don't be surprised about the large number of subtitles from subtitle sites that won't fit.
My subs are all checked for errors, time-stamps improved.
Also the Chinese BD version is a bit darker and has cropped 2x20 px (1040p).
